Uses of Class
ch.lambdaj.collection.LambdaIterable

  • Packages that use LambdaIterable 
    Package Description
    ch.lambdaj.collection  

    • Uses of LambdaIterable in ch.lambdaj.collection

      Subclasses of LambdaIterable in ch.lambdaj.collection 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LambdaCollection<T>
      A collection that extends the collection interface with the fluent interface methods provided by lambdaj
      class  LambdaList<T>
      A List that extends the List interface with the fluent interface methods provided by lambdaj
      class  LambdaSet<T>
      A Set that extends the Set interface with the fluent interface methods provided by lambdaj
      Methods in ch.lambdaj.collection that return LambdaIterable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LambdaIterable<T> LambdaIterable.clone()
      Returns a shallow copy of this Collection instance.
      <V> LambdaIterable<V> LambdaIterable.convert(Converter<T,V> converter)
      Converts all the object in this iterable using the given Converter.
      LambdaIterable<T> LambdaIterable.distinct(Object argument)
      Selects all the items in this iterable having a different value on the given argument defined using the on method.
      <V> LambdaIterable<V> LambdaIterable.extract(V argument)
      Converts all the object in this iterable extracting the property defined by the given argument.
      <V> LambdaIterable<V> LambdaIterable.project(Class<V> targetClass, Object... arguments)
      Converts the objects in this iterable in objects of the given target Class.
      LambdaIterable<T> LambdaIterable.remove(org.hamcrest.Matcher<?> matcher)
      Removes all the objects in this iterable that match the given hamcrest Matcher
      LambdaIterable<T> LambdaIterable.replace(org.hamcrest.Matcher<?> matcher, T replacer)
      Replace with the given replacer all the items in this iterable that match the given matcher
      LambdaIterable<T> LambdaIterable.retain(org.hamcrest.Matcher<?> matcher)
      Retains all the objects in this iterable that match the given hamcrest Matcher
      LambdaIterable<T> LambdaIterable.sort(Object argument)
      Sorts all the items in this iterable on the respective values of the given argument.
      LambdaIterable<T> LambdaIterable.sort(Object argument, int option)
      Sorts all the items in this iterable on the respective values of the given argument.
      static <T> LambdaIterable<T> LambdaCollections.with(Iterable<? extends T> iterable)
      Creates a LambdaIterable that wraps the given Iterable
